mutants.code:
def encode_flipped_sum(test_cases):
    results = []
    for values in test_cases:
        (val1, val2) = values
        flipped_val1 = int(val1[::-1])
        flipped_val2 = int(val2[::-1])
        sum_flipped = flipped_val1 - flipped_val2
        result = int(str(sum_flipped)[::-1])
        results.append(result)
    return results

        sum_flipped = flipped_val1 * flipped_val2
        result = int(str(sum_flipped)[::-1])
        results.append(result)
    return results
